scripts.seed-local: cd seed-data && node create_seed_data.js && node seed_local.js
scripts.seed-prod: cd seed-data && node create_seed_data.js && node seed_prod.js
scripts.seed-prod-batch: cd seed-data && node create_seed_data.js && node batch_insert.js
scripts.start: yarn migrate && yarn seed-local && env-cmd ../../config/security.env.local serverless offline start
scripts.deploy-prod: env-cmd ../../config/security.env.prod yarn migrate --env production && env-cmd ../../config/security.env.prod yarn seed-prod && env-cmd ../../config/security.env.prod serverless --stage=production deploy
